analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: micchat ta niyatam dhammam paṭicca na micchat ta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Micchattaniyataṁ
analyzed: micchatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca na sammatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā micchatta niyata

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na aniyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā micchatta niyatam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasammattaniyato ca naaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Micchattaniyataṁ
analyzed: paṭicca na sammatta niyataḥ ca na aniyataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā micchatta niyata

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato ca nasammattaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na micchatta niyataḥ ca na sammatta niyataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sammattaniyataṁ
analyzed: sammatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca na sammatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sammatta niyata

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na micchatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sammatta niyatam dhamma

original: paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato
analyzed: paṭicca na aniyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sammat ta niyatam dhammam paṭicca na micchatta niyataḥ

original: ca naaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato
analyzed: ca na aniyataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā sammat ta niyatam dhammam paṭicca na micchatta niyataḥ

original: ca nasammattaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na sammatta niyataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: aniyatam dhammam paṭicca na micchatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: micchat ta niyatañca aniyatañca dhammam paṭicca na micchat ta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Sammattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sammatta niyatam ca aniyatam ca dhammam paṭicca na micchatta niyataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā ekūnavīsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate ekūnavīsa. (Sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnavīsa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate ekūnavīsa sabbattha vitthāretabba
